## General Announcements

## Announcements

### The call for the 2016/18 Tracking POG has been officially made:

1. Jan 5: call has been made
1. Feb 2: close nominations, send mail to all candidates
1. Feb 9 – deadline for candidates to give availability
1. Feb 12 – show list of nominations to SC
1. Mar 12 – propose selection of L2s to SC
1. Apr 20 – proposed list of nominations to MB

### EPR 2015
1. We will try to review and finalize the EPR for 2015, together with an updated list of open tasks, in the coming days/weeks.
1. The result will be available in a page similar to the one used last year [2014](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/TrackingPOGTasks2014).

## Releases

### 7_3 Series has ended with _pre3, released late last year:

### CMSSW_7_3_0_pre3
#### Changes since CMSSW_7_3_0_pre2:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/CMSSW_7_3_0_pre2...CMSSW_7_3_0_pre3

1. [6528](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6528)  from @VinInn: replace divisions by multiplications in TkRadialStripTopology `geometry`

1. [6166](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6166)  from @arizzi: Jet Core pixel cluster splitter `reconstruction`

1. [6349](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6349)  from @wmtford: Flag merged clusters for relaxed CPE errors `reconstruction`

1. [6331](http://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/6331)  from @mtosi: fix track algoName for HLT tracking `dqm`  `reconstruction`
